    • ======= Setup heroku for staging 2014-07-01T00:00:00-07:00 http://solid-interactive.github.io/Recipes/2014/07/01/setup-heroku-for-staging

    1. Install heroku toolbelt.

    2. Create an app.

      heroku create < appName >

    3. Add Heroku remote to git

      heroku git:remote -a < appName >

    4. Deploy

      grunt deploy
    Setup Git and release branches 2014-06-30T00:00:00-07:00 http://solid-interactive.github.io/Recipes/2014/06/30/setup-git-and-release-branches

    1. Initialize git repository.

      git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'initial structure'

    2. Create repo in either gitlab or github, then copy paste that sucker.

    3. Add a remote repository if desired.

      git remote add origin git://github.com/Solid-Interactive/YourNewApp.git

    4. Push master

       git push -u origin master

    5. Add git extras by visionmedia. 

      brew install git-extras

    6. Unlink pre-commit hooks if installed.

      mv .git/hooks/pre-commit .git/hooks/pre-commit.bkp

    7. Create orphan branches (uses gh-pages from the previous step). This creates an orphan branch called gh-pages.

      git gh-pages

    8. Copy .gitignore from master, add, then commit it.

      git checkout master -- .gitignore && git add .gitignore && git commit -m 'Added .gitignore'

    9. Relink pre-commit hooks.

      mv .git/hooks/pre-commit.bkp .git/hooks/pre-commit

    10. Rename gh-pages branch to either stage or production.

      git branch -m <oldName> <newName>

    11. Push that new branch to origin.

      git push -u origin <newName>

    <<<<<<< HEAD ======= Setting up masseuse 2014-06-27T00:00:00-07:00 http://solid-interactive.github.io/Recipes/2014/06/27/setting-up-masseuse

    1. See if grunt init masseuse is installed

      grunt-init masseuse

    2. Install grunt-init if not installed

      npm install -g grunt-init

    3. Install masseuse template into grunt-init directory

      git clone git@github.com:Solid-Interactive/grunt-init-masseuse.git ~/.grunt-init/masseuse

    4. Set up project scaffolding

      grunt-init masseuse

    5. Install dependencies

      npm install && bower install

    6. Test your install

      grunt server

    7. (Optional) Setup git repository and release branches

    8. (Optional) Setup and deploy to Heroku
